TopicTitle: Returning to the gauntlet (The Jebidiah Kerman Chronicle returns!)

Articles.Content: Some of you may know a few months ago I tried to start an animation for KSP. Everything went bad but I'm still faithful. I want this to happen so much I'm reaching out for help. I'll take all the help I can get from texture to modeling to music. Who's with me! original thread here:http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/103045-kerbal-space-program-the-jebidiah-kerman-story/#comment-1812238
